static GISGEOM_API GisDirectPositionImpl* GisDirectPositionImpl::Create (  double  x,
double  y,
double  z,
double  m
)  [static]
 

Constructs a 4D GisDirectPositionImpl object from X, Y, Z and M ordinates.

Remarks:
Dimensionality is set to GisDimensionality_XY|GisDimensionality_Z|GisDimensionality_M.
Parameters:
x Input X ordinate value
y Input Y ordinate value
z Input Z ordinate value
m Input M ordinate value
Returns:
Returns a position
